sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import AccordionStyles from './AccordionStyles' function Accordion(props) { const [isOpen, setOpen] = useState(false); return (
setOpen(!isOpen)} > {props.today} {props.min_temp}/{props.max_temp}°C
Morning Afternoon Evening Night Temperature {props.morning_temp}°C {props.afternoon_temp}°C {props.evening_temp}°C {props.night_temp}°C
); } export default Accordion;
